name: SPEC_SECTION_COMMENTS
description: This table contains comments for all the specimens documented in Specimens navigator section.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPEC_SECTION_COMMENT
columns.description: This item stores the section-level comments for all specimens in the Specimens navigator section.
